 2021-08222021-08-06,  ,  ECCC,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Assessment Act, 2012
SubjectGrassy Mountain Coal Project in southwestern Alberta
PrecisOrder deciding that the significant adverse environmental effects likely to be caused by the GRASSY MOUNTAIN COAL PROJECT in southwestern Alberta, proposed by Benga Mining Limited, are not justified in the circumstances.
AttachmentsAttachment
